draw.basic

Class RotatedEllipse

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw.basic.RotatedEllipse

  • public class RotatedEllipse
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic rotated ellipse class for drawing.

      • RotatedEllipse

        public RotatedEllipse(double x,
              double y,
              double a,
              double b,
              double angle)
        Parameters:
        x - Center x coordinate.
        y - Center y coordinate.
        a - Ellipse parameter.
        b - Ellipse parameter.
        angle - Angle of the rotated ellipse.

      • RotatedEllipse

        public RotatedEllipse(Cluster clust,
              boolean multiply)
        Instantiates a rotated ellipse object from a cluster of SIFT features.
        Parameters:
        clust - SIFT cluster that is being visualized.
        multiply - Boolean flag indicating whether to multiply the lengths of the axes by the confidence scores.
